private.title: 100% Private Tours
private.body: No strangers, no crowds. Every tour is exclusively your group — family, friends, whoever you bring. We move at your pace.

transport.title: Transportation Included
transport.body: I pick you up and drop you off at your hotel or resort (Playa del Carmen, Tulum, Puerto Aventuras, Akumal). Air-conditioned comfort all the way.

languages.title: English, Spanish & Russian
languages.body: I guide fluently in all three languages. If your group speaks different languages, no problem — everyone gets the full story.

custom.title: Custom Itineraries
custom.body: Want to mix cenotes with ruins? Prefer more wildlife time and less history? Let me know what excites you and I'll build the perfect day around it.

q1.question: How far in advance should I book?
q1.answer: I recommend booking at least a week ahead, especially in high season (December–April). But if I'm available last-minute, we'll make it happen.

q2.question: Do you provide snorkeling gear?
q2.answer: Yes! On any tour that includes cenotes or snorkeling, I bring masks, fins, and life jackets for all ages.

q3.question: Can you pick us up from our resort?
q3.answer: Absolutely. I pick up from Playa del Carmen, Tulum, Puerto Aventuras, and Akumal. Pickup from Cancún may have an extra transport fee — just ask.

q4.question: What if we have young kids?
q4.answer: Kids are welcome! Some cenotes are shallow and calm, perfect for little ones. I'll recommend tours that fit your family's comfort level.

q5.question: Can we customize a tour?
q5.answer: Yes! Tell me what you're interested in and I'll design a custom itinerary. Mix ruins, cenotes, wildlife, culture — whatever you want to see.

q6.question: Is lunch included?
q6.answer: Depends on the tour. Some include a local meal; others don't. I'll always point you toward great spots if it's not included.

about.title: Hi, I'm Kat
about.intro: I've been guiding private tours in the Riviera Maya for over 8 years. I grew up exploring cenotes, learning Mayan history, and falling in love with this jungle paradise — and now I get to share it with travelers from around the world.
about.whyBody: Most tours feel rushed, overcrowded, and impersonal. I wanted to create the opposite: small, private experiences where you actually connect with the place. No megaphones, no tourist traps, just real Mexico.
about.experienceBody: Fluent in English, Spanish, and Russian. Certified guide with deep knowledge of Mayan archaeology, local ecology, and the best hidden spots the Riviera Maya has to offer.
about.promiseBody: You'll never feel rushed. You'll never be just another face in a crowd. Every tour I lead is built around your group's pace, interests, and energy. This is your day — I'm just here to make it unforgettable.
